description:
For over 20 years, our attorneys at the personal injury law firm of Reed & Terry, LLP, have offered dedicated legal services to people throughout Fort Bend County, Texas. When the negligent or reckless actions of others leave people with serious injuries, our attorneys are committed to helping them obtain maximum compensation.

The simple acts of another person or business can leave people struggling with serious injuries and a range of complex challenges. During a free initial consultation, our attorneys discuss clients' rights and options, as well as review the circumstances of their injuries to understand their full extent. Understanding the challenges they may face, from mounting medical bills to lost income, we look out for our clients' best interests throughout the process and strive to see that their short- and long-term needs are met.

Whether dealing with the at-fault parties and their legal counsel or large insurance companies, our law firm puts our clients' well-being above all else. We stand by their side and strive to see them made as close to whole as possible. Our attorneys look to efficiently resolve our clients' issues to their satisfaction without going to trial whenever possible, but we prepare each case as though it will have to stand up in court.

Having more than four decades of combined legal experience, our attorneys at the law firm of Reed & Terry, LLP, know that while cases may share similarities, no two accidents, injuries or claims are the same. We customize our approach to suit our clients' needs and legal objectives, working to help them recover the compensation they deserve. For the convenience of those we represent, we have offices in Sugar Land, Katy and Richmond, and we accept credit card payments.
